name: mithraic-armor
description: A weekend project to explore cose.

scripts.shove: git add -A; git commit -m ':rocket:'; git push origin main
scripts.prego:test:wasm:web: npm run go:build:wasm ; cat $(go env GOROOT)/misc/wasm/wasm_exec.js > ./bin/wasm_exec.js
scripts.prego:test:wasm:node: npm run go:build:wasm ; cat $(go env GOROOT)/misc/wasm/wasm_exec.js > ./bin/wasm_exec.js
scripts.prego:test:wasm:node:lib: npm run go:build:wasm ; cat $(go env GOROOT)/misc/wasm/wasm_exec.js > ./bin/wasm_exec.js

author: Orie Steele
